itemDescription: Signature fried chicken made with KFC's secret blend of 11 herbs and spices.
Spicy chicken fillet, lettuce, mayo, and a soft bun, perfect for those who like it hot.
Bite-sized chicken pieces with a crispy coating, perfect as a snack or side.
Grilled or crispy chicken strips, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and mayo, wrapped in a tortilla.
Spicy and crispy chicken wings, available in various quantities.
Creamy mashed potatoes made with real potatoes, topped with KFC's signature gravy.
Refreshing crushed ice beverage available in various flavors like Mango, Strawberry, or Chocolate.
